requirements.title: File format: PDF
File name must use only English letters, underscore lines, and Arabic numbers with no spaces in the file name
Check margins: 1" on the left, 1" on the right and bottom. 2" top margin to begin each major section like preliminary pages, chapters, title page, and references; 1" top margin for all other pages
Line spacing: The body text must be double spaced with no extra spaces between paragraphs
Line spacing: Footnotes, bibliographic entries, long quoted passages, etc. should be single spaced
Font: Use a standard 12-point font consistently throughout the document, including headings and subheadings, and must be black font including URLs.
There should be no bold font on preliminary pages
Justification: left justification throughout the document and for page number entries in CONTENTS and LISTS, the page numbers should be right aligned.
Remove "orphans" (headings or sub-headings located at the bottom of a page that is not followed by text) and "widows" (short lines ending a paragraph at the top of the page)
No Blank pages in the document
Pagination: Numbers must be positioned 0.5 inches from the bottom of the page and centered
Pagination: Numbers must correspond with the Table of Contents and any List Pages
Pagination: Page numbers cannot be bolded and must be the same font size and same font type as general document.
Pagination Roman numerals: Do not use page numbers before the ABSTRACT page Begin with p. ii on the ABSTRACT page and continue with all pages following until the first page of the text
Pagination Arabic numerals: Begin Arabic numerals with p. 1 on the first page of the body text
Other: see comments
Title page: Title must be at least three lines that are made into an inverted pyramid and double spaced
Title page: 2 double spaces beneath title
Title page: "by" is in all lowercase
Title page: There cannot be two co-chairs; one must be a chair and one is a co-chair
Title page: Correct department listed
Title page: TUSCALOOSA, ALABAMA in all caps with ALABAMA spelled out
Title page: Year of graduation, not year of submission, at bottom of the page
Copyright Page: Single space between name/copyright notice and "ALL RIGHTS RESERVED"
Abstract: Must be double spaced and must not exceed 350-word limit
Abstract: Do not include graphs, charts, tables, or other illustrations in the abstract
Abstract: Include no more than 6 keywords or key phrases at the end of the abstract
Dedication page: optional
List of abbreviations and symbols: mandatory if the document has abbreviations and symbols
Acknowledgments
Contents: Must include each of the preliminary pages except title and copyright page with correct page numbers

Contents: Headings/subheadings should be indented hierarchically. Also the headings/subheadings/chapter titles must match exactly between CONTENTS and the general document, i.e. punctuation, capitalization, numbering (if any used) and spelling
Contents: All references must be at the end of the document but before Appendices
Contents: All page numbers should be right justified on the margin
Contents: All entries longer than one line must be single spaced but maintain double spaces between separate entries
Contents: The text should not run over the page numbers
Contents: Use leaders (the multiple periods)
Contents: No italicization or bolding in CONTENTS
Contents: Should be CONTENTS and not TABLE OF CONTENTS
List of figures: Must include the figure number, exact title, and figure page number
List of figures: All entries longer than one line must be single spaced but maintain double spaces between separate entries
List of figures: The text should not run over the page numbers
List of Additional Files, i.e. LIST OF SCHEMES: required only if additional files are included
Text: Must be divided into chapters/sections
Text: Include materials that are independent of but relevant to the text (ex. surveys, additional data, computer printouts)
Text: Must conform to rules for margins, but print may be reduced in size
Text: Each major section like separate chapters must begin with a 2" top margin
References: Cannot split one reference on to two pages
References: All URLs must be in black ink
References: Begin the first page of REFERENCES with a 2" top margin
Appendices: Optional
Other: see comments
Table/figure placement: Tables/figures may not be grouped at the end of the dissertation
Table/figure headings: Table headings must be positioned above the table using the same font style and size as used in the main body text
Table/figure headings: Do not abbreviate the word "figure"
Table/figure headings: Place page numbers in portrait position for landscaped pages
For landscaped tables/figures, headings placed on the same page must be in landscape orientation to match the table/figure
Other: see comments
Do not reproduce signatures in electronic theses/dissertations
Other: see comments

If your research has IRB approval letters they must be included as the final appendix (if you have other appendices) and it must be titled and formatted like the other appendices. The CONTENTS must signify what page has the IRB Approval Letters in it
All ink signatures and initials are blacked out
Begin with a 2" top margin
Other: see comments
Security restrictions: do not incorporate restrictions such as prohibiting copy/paste, compression, or password protection
Other: see comments
Submit confirmation page: Survey of Earned Doctorates https://sed-ncses.org
Submit above document via "Manage additional files" within your ETD and follow the file naming conventions in the ETD Submission Guide
